name: Darkness within the light
description:
I know this game is very short.But I started pretty late in the jam.Actually I am not a regular developer I have just started my journey about 5 days ago.I participated in this jam when I used to make basic html ripoff games.But then I looked at the participant number and got scared so I backed off.

Later on I got to know about construct engine.So, I started learning it and gained confidence.Then I rejoined the jam and.I am very happy that I am at least able to complete the game and upload it.

More about the game-This game idea was in my mind for very long but I did not have proper knowledge to execute it.I may also upload a better and improvised version of it.

Thank you.
